sections.heading: Pawnbroker; limitation on sale of goods
sections.text: It shall be unlawful for any pawnbroker to sell any goods purchased or received as described in section 69-201, during the period of four months from the date of purchasing or receiving such goods.SourceLaws 1899, c. 10, ยง 9, p. 66;R.S.1913, ยง 544;C.S.1922, ยง
